text: Montigny-le-Bretonneux is a commune. It is in ÃŽle-de-France in the Yvelines department in north-central France. In 2020, 31,854 people lived in Montigny- le-Bretonneux. The commune is in the southwestern suburbs of Paris, from the center. == Twin towns == Montigny-le-Bretonneux is twinned with: * Kierspe, Germany * Lunca, Romania * Denton, United Kingdom * Wicklow, Ireland * San Fernando, Spain * Marostica, Italy == Other websites == * The commune's website (in French) Category:Communes in Yvelines
title: Montigny-le-Bretonneux
